articles.title: Johnny Depp hugs his lawyer after closing argument in Amber Heard trial. Viral video wins fans' hearts - India Today
articles.description: During the final argument in Johnny Depp-Amber Heard's defamation trial, the actor's lawyer Ben Chew delivered an emotional closing statement. Depp hugged Chew soon after that, a video of which is now going viral.
